summary.title: Summary
summary.description: Full Stack Developer with expertise in React, Flutter, and backend architecture on Google Cloud and AWS. Skilled in creating scalable web and mobile applications with a strong focus on UI/UX and optimal user engagement. Proficient in rapid prototyping, game development workflows, and prompt engineering for LLM-based solutions.

sub-sections.title: Let’s Be Critic
details: Implemented an LLM-powered search trigger analyzing user input and past results, cutting unnecessary queries by 70%
Developed a Firestore-based tracking & scheduler system to automate conversation summaries, reducing backend costs nearly tenfold
Leveraged a dual-LLM approach (APIs, vector stores, Cloud Run) for complaint data processing at minimal operational cost

sub-sections.title: DrawAll
details: Built a grid-based, coordinate-query lazy-load system, reducing average board load time by 300% and enabling infinite-length boards
Created the 'Paper' layering framework, cutting ~5,000 lines of code and powering features like media cards, posts, and buttons
Architected end-to-end data flow using Firestore and Google Cloud Storage for multiple features (Posts, Media Cards, Board Configs)

sub-sections.title: Hero’s Clock
details: Developed a Flutter-based timer and challenge app, boosting daily productivity by an estimated 50–70%
Implemented a page-view UI and 'cached last page' mechanic, reducing essential click steps from 3 to 1
Created custom vector assets using Adobe Illustrator to enhance visual appeal and user engagement

sub-sections.title: Hello World
details: Co-developed a 'togo quest' system cutting Google Maps API usage by 500% via SQL caching and distance checks
Oversaw UI and app flow design for 3 main features and 8 distinct screens
Implemented a Node.js backend on Google Cloud Run to efficiently handle LLM requests
